MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Newtongrange. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have worked along side the emergency services and begun the necessary repairs to restore supplies. We are currently awaiting on additional staff to arrive on site to assist and we now expect your supply to be restored by 10:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:06pm on Saturday 17th April 2021
